name: Reading International Business Park
overview:
Reading International Business Park offers a unique office opportunity with its unrivalled proximity to Junction 11 of the M4 and access to Reading - the commerce capital of the Thames Valley.

Reading 360 forms the 3rd and final phase of the award winning Reading International Business Park.
